original_query: SELECT MIN(b.Id) FROM badges as b, users as u WHERE b.UserId= u.Id AND u.UpVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.UpVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.Id)
